info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 20 at 7:00PM CDT until April 20 at 9:30PM CDT by NWS Springfield MO
info.description:
* WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues.
* WHERE...A portion of southwest Missouri, including the following counties, Christian, Greene and Stone.
* WHEN...Until 930 PM CDT.
* IMPACTS...Flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations is imminent or occurring.
* ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 659 PM CDT, The Department of Transportation reported slow moving thunderstorms with very heavy rainfall across the warned area. Between 2 and 4 inches of rain have fallen. - This includes the following low water crossings... Wilson's Creek at Old Limey Road, Little Crane Creek at Old Wire Road, Woods Fork at Woods Fork Road, Green Valley Creek at Holder RD, Parchcorn Creek at Smyrna Road, Dry Crane Creek at Jasmine Road and Wilson Creek at Farm Road 146. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Springfield, Nixa, Ozark, Republic, Battlefield, Strafford, Highlandville, Willard, Clever, Ash Grove, Crane, Fair Grove, Billings, Walnut Grove, Fremont Hills, Brookline, Hurley, Spokane, Galloway, Boaz, Glidewell, Bois D'arc, Ebenezer, Turners, Selmore, Cave Springs, Linden, Sacville, Ponce de Leon, Bassville and Elsey. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Many flood deaths occur in vehicles.

parameter.value: FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 930 PM CDT THIS EVENING

area.areaDesc: Christian, MO; Greene, MO; Stone, MO
